title: Page not found
detail: The endpoint does not registered. Check in the reference if the endpoint exist.

title: Invalid token
detail: You need a valid authentication to the API. You need to send a valid token (which has not expired and whose the IP address correspond to yours). Look at the information below in the rubric 'Token'.

title: Invalid role
detail: You need a valid role to access to the API.

title: Invalid login
detail: Incorrect information of connection. The email or the password does not valid.

title: Error with this property
detail: The property may not exist or can contain an error in the name or in the format. The name of the property is indicated in the key property of the response.

title: Id does not exist
detail: No content found with this id in this table. The name of the table is indicated in the key property of the response.

title: OK
detail: The content is retrieved with success

title: Successful added
detail: The content is added with success

title: Successful updated
detail: The content is updated with success

title: Successful deleted
detail: The content is deleted or archived with success
